Finding.definition: a determination resulting from judicial or administrative examination or inquiry

usu pl.definition: a written statement of such determinations see alsocompare,,,

finding of fact.definition: a determination made by the trier of fact as to a factual issue based on the evidence presented in a case
finding of fact.note: Conclusions of law are based on findings of fact.

finding of law.definition: a court's determination of the law as applied to a case

gen·er·al finding.definition: a finding that the facts in general support a judgment in favor of one of the parties

spe·cial finding.definition: a finding setting out the ultimate facts upon which the court's judgment is based
